unstake."}},"updateBattleRecord(uint256,uint256,uint8,uint256,bool)":{"details":"Only the game server address is authorized to update the battle record.Only the fighter that initiates the battle expends voltage on the match.Only fighters that have NRN staked are able to earn points.","params":{"battleResult":"The result of the battle.","eloFactor":"Multiple derived from ELO to be applied to fighter."}}},"title":"RankedBattle","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"Claimed(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Event emitted when claimed."},"PointsChanged(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Event emitted adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.access: Whether the address has admin access or not.

claimNRN().details: Caller can only claim once per round.

returns._0: Record which is comprised of wins, ties, and losses for the token.
Round id, nrns to be distributed, and total point tally

params.roundId_: The round ID for which to get the nrn distribution.

returns._0: Distribution amount for the specified round ID.
The amount of unclaimed NRN tokens.

instantiateMergingPoolContract(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.mergingPoolAddress: The address of the MergingPool contract.

instantiateNeuronContract(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.nrnAddress: The address of the Neuron contract.

setBpsLostPerLoss(uint256).details: Only admins are authorized to call this function.

params.bpsLostPerLoss_: The basis points lost per loss.

setGameServerAddress(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

setNewRound().details: Only admins are authorized to move the round forward.

setRankedNrnDistribution(uint256).details: Only admins are authorized to change the ranked NRN distribution.newDistribution is NOT denominated in wei. As such, it is multiplied by 10**18.

setStakeAtRiskAddress(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.stakeAtRiskAddress: The address of the Stake At Risk contract.

params.amount: The amount of NRN tokens to stake.
params.tokenId: The ID of the fighter to stake.

transferOwnership(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newOwnerAddress: The address of the new owner

params.amount: The amount of NRN tokens to unstake.
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to unstake.

updateBattleRecord(uint256,uint256,uint8.details: Only the game server address is authorized to update the battle record.Only the fighter that initiates the battle expends voltage on the match.Only fighters that have NRN staked are able to earn points.

params.eloFactor: Multiple derived from ELO to be applied to the base points earned.
params.mergingPortion: The portion of points that get redirected to the merging pool.

accumulatedPointsPerAddress(address,uint.notice: Maps address to round ID to track accumulated points.

accumulatedPointsPerFighter(uint256,uint.notice: Maps token ID to round ID to track accumulated points.

adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).notice: Adjusts admin access for a user.

amountClaimed(address).notice: Mapping of address to the amount of NRNs they have claimed.

amountStaked(uint256).notice: Mapping of token id to staked amount.

bpsLostPerLoss().notice: Number of basis points for lost rounds.

claimNRN().notice: Claims NRN tokens for the specified rounds.

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract by setting various addresses and instantiating contract instances. It also designates the owner address as an admin.

fighterBattleRecord(uint256).notice: Mapping of token id to battle record struct.

getBattleRecord(uint256).notice: Gets the battle record for a token.

getCurrentStakingData().notice: Gets the staking data for a token.

getNrnDistribution(uint256).notice: Retrieves the nrn distribution amount for the given round ID.

getUnclaimedNRN(address).notice: Gets the unclaimed NRN tokens for a specific address.

hasUnstaked(uint256,uint256).notice: Maps the token ID to the round ID and indicates whether it is Unstaked or not.

numRoundsClaimed(address).notice: Maps the user address to the number of rounds they've claimed for

rankedNrnDistribution(uint256).notice: Mapping of roundID to nrn distribution amount for a ranked period.

setBpsLostPerLoss(uint256).notice: Sets the basis points lost per ranked match lost while in a point deficit.

setNewRound().notice: Sets a new round, making claiming available for that round.

setRankedNrnDistribution(uint256).notice: Sets the ranked nrn distribution amount for the current round.

setStakeAtRiskAddress(address).notice: Sets the StakeAtRisk contract address and instantiates the contract.

stakingFactor(uint256).notice: Mapping of token id to staking factor.

totalAccumulatedPoints(uint256).notice: Maps round ID to total accumulated points.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership from one address to another.

updateBattleRecord(uint256,uint256,uint8.notice: Updates the battle record for a fighter.

@notice Claims NRN tokens for the specified rounds.
 @dev Caller can only claim once per round.

statements.documentation: Check how many NRNs the fighter has at risk
Calculate the staking factor if it has not already been calculated for this round
Potential amount of NRNs to put at risk or retrieve from the stake-at-risk contract
Do not allow users to lose more NRNs than they have in their staking pool
If the fighter does not have any points for this round, NRNs become at risk of being lost
If the fighter has a positive point balance for this round, deduct points
If the user has no NRNs at risk, then they can earn points
Divert a portion of the points to the merging pool
Do not allow users to reclaim more NRNs than they have at risk

If the user has stake-at-risk for their fighter, reclaim a portion
 Reclaiming stake-at-risk puts the NRN back into their staking pool
Add points to the fighter for this round
